entry.title: java网络编程
entry.content: java网络编程1、NIO123456789101112131415161718psvm{ ServerSocket ss = new ServerSocket(); ss.bind(new InetSocketAddress("127.0.0.1"),8888); while(true){ Socket s = ss.accept(); new Thread(() ->{ heandle(s); }).start(); }}static void handle(Socket s){ try{ byte[] bytes = new byte[1024]; int len = s.getInputStream().read(bytes); s.getOutputStream().write(bytes,0,len); }catch {bala}} graph RL ss --bind --> s subgraph server s(s:127.0.0.1:8888) end subgraph listen s --accept--> thread1 s --accept--> thread2 s --accept-->thread3 end

entry.title: 打 打一个大菠萝呀
Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
